## Violent Gun Crimes in `r paste(month(thismonth, label = TRUE, abbr = FALSE), thisyear)`

```{r, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, layout="l-page", fig.height=8}

dpdPalette <- colorFactor(
  palette = c(CPALtools::pal_cpalfac),
  domain = dpdMonth$crime_title
)

monthPopup <- paste0("<b>Incident: </b>", dpdMonth$incidentnum, " <b>Beat: </b>", dpdMonth$beat, "<br/>",
                   "<b>Officer: </b>", dpdMonth$ro1name, "<b> Badge: </b>", dpdMonth$ro1badge, "<br/>",
                   "<b>NIBRS: </b>", dpdMonth$nibrs_title, "<br/>",
                   "<b>Date: </b>", dpdMonth$Date, "<br/>",
                   "<b>Time: </b>", dpdMonth$Time, "<b> Time of Day: </b>", dpdMonth$ToD, "<br/>",
                   "<b>Address: </b>", dpdMonth$incident_address, "<br/>",
                   "<b>Is VGC?: </b>", dpdMonth$vgc_flag, " <b>Premise: </b>", dpdMonth$premise, "<br/>",
                   "<b>MO: </b>", dpdMonth$mo, "<br/>"
                   
                   )

weekPopup <- paste0("<b>Incident: </b>", dpdWeek$incidentnum, " <b>Beat: </b>", dpdWeek$beat, "<br/>",
                   "<b>Officer: </b>", dpdMonth$ro1name, "<b> Badge: </b>", dpdMonth$ro1badge, "<br/>",
                   "<b>NIBRS: </b>", dpdWeek$nibrs_title, "<br/>",
                   "<b>Date: </b>", dpdWeek$Date, "<br/>",
                   "<b>Time: </b>", dpdWeek$Time, " <b>Time of Day: </b>", dpdWeek$ToD, "<br/>",
                   "<b>Address: </b>", dpdWeek$incident_address, "<br/>",
                   "<b>Is VGC?: </b>", dpdMonth$vgc_flag, " <b>Premise: </b>", dpdWeek$premise, "<br/>",
                   "<b>MO: </b>", dpdWeek$mo, "<br/>"
                   
                   )


leaflet() %>%
#  setView(lng = -96.7970, lat = 32.7767, zoom = 10) %>%
  addTiles(urlTemplate = cpal_mapbox, attribution = cpal_leaflet) %>%
  addPolygons(data = SE_HR,
              weight = 1,
              opacity = 0.5,
              color = "#686158",
              #dashArray = "3",
              fillOpacity = 0.3,
              group = "High Risk Cell",
              ) %>%
    addPolygons(data = SC_HR,
              weight = 1,
              opacity = 0.5,
              color = "#686158",
              #dashArray = "3",
              fillOpacity = 0.3,
              group = "High Risk Cell",
              ) %>%
  addPolygons(data = SW_HR,
              weight = 1,
              opacity = 0.5,
              color = "#686158",
              #dashArray = "3",
              fillOpacity = 0.3,
              group = "High Risk Cell",
              ) %>%
  addPolygons(data = C_HR,
              weight = 1,
              opacity = 0.5,
              color = "#686158",
              #dashArray = "3",
              fillOpacity = 0.3,
              group = "High Risk Cell",
              ) %>%
  addPolygons(data = NE_HR,
              weight = 1,
              opacity = 0.5,
              color = "#686158",
              #dashArray = "3",
              fillOpacity = 0.3,
              group = "High Risk Cell",
              ) %>%
  addPolygons(data = NW_HR,
              weight = 1,
              opacity = 0.5,
              color = "#686158",
              #dashArray = "3",
              fillOpacity = 0.3,
              group = "High Risk Cell",
              ) %>%
  addPolygons(data = NC_HR,
              weight = 1,
              opacity = 0.5,
              color = "#686158",
              #dashArray = "3",
              fillOpacity = 0.3,
              group = "High Risk Cell",
              ) %>%
  addPolygons(data = dpd_divisions,
              weight = 2,
              opacity = 1,
              color = "#686158",
              #dashArray = "3",
              fillOpacity = 0,
              group = "DPD Divisions",
              ) %>%
  addCircleMarkers(data = dpdMonth,
                   stroke = FALSE,
                   radius = 4,
                   fillOpacity = 0.8,
                   color = ~dpdPalette(crime_title),
                   popup = ~monthPopup,
                   group = "Incidents Last Month") %>%
  addCircleMarkers(data = dpdWeek,
                   stroke = FALSE,
                   radius = 4,
                   fillOpacity = 0.8,
                   color = ~dpdPalette(crime_title),
                   popup = ~weekPopup,
                   group = "Incidents Last Week") %>%
  addLegend(data = dpdMonth,
            position = "bottomleft",
            pal = dpdPalette,
            #colors = CPALtools::pal_cpalfac,
            values = ~crime_title,
            title = "NIBRS Incidents",
            opacity = 0.7) %>%
  addLayersControl(
    overlayGroups = c("Incidents Last Month", "Incidents Last Week", "High Risk Cell"),
    baseGroups = c("DPD Divisions"),
    position = "topright",
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE))
```
